DBus::Variant< T > Class Template Reference

A Variant is a type of DBus object that can be one of several different types of normal DBus object. More...

Detailed Description

template<class T>
class DBus::Variant< T >

A Variant is a type of DBus object that can be one of several different types of normal DBus object.

In other words, a variant can hold different values, but only one value at a time.
